name: What's In The Attic? - Demo
description:
Play as Fiona Wells, a sheriff's deputy at the beginning of her story and witness first-hand the start of her journey into a case steeped in strange phenomena, anxiety and mystery.

The What's In The Attic? demo acts as an introduction to the mechanics, world and narrative behind the game world and Fiona's unnerving experience, granting her exposure to a series of events and a dimension she didn't believe existed.

We hope you enjoy our game demo, the full game will be coming in 2021 incorporating polished mechanics and any feedback given.

Players can submit feedback or bug reports on our website under the Feedback / Bug Report page.

Thank you for checking out our game, we hope you enjoy it.
